title: ASOBO_material_rain_options glTF extension
description: This extension is used to add Rain on the surface material.

rainDropScale.description: Determine the scale of the  rain drops on the surface. If the value is high, the rain drops are gonna be smaller and if the value is low, the rain drops are big on the surface.

rainDropSide.description: For WindShield only, determine on which side of the glass the rain will be. Default at false, the rain is on the front face. This value is to change if the rain move with wind in the wrong direction.
